createTree(SortitionSumTreeFactory.Sorti.details: Create a sortition sum tree at the specified key.

params._K: The number of children each node in the tree should have.
params._key: The key of the new tree.

draw(SortitionSumTreeFactory.SortitionSu.details: Draw an ID from a tree using a number. Note that this function reverts if the sum of all values in the tree is 0.
draw(SortitionSumTreeFactory.SortitionSu.return: ID The drawn ID. `O(k * log_k(n))` where `k` is the maximum number of childs per node in the tree,  and `n` is the maximum number of nodes ever appended.

queryLeafs(SortitionSumTreeFactory.Sorti.details: Query the leaves of a tree. Note that if `startIndex == 0`, the tree is empty and the root node will be returned.

params._count: The number of items to return.
params._key: The key of the tree to get the leaves from.

queryLeafs(SortitionSumTreeFactory.Sorti.return: startIndex The index at which leaves start.values The values of the returned leaves.hasMore Whether there are more for pagination. `O(n)` where `n` is the maximum number of nodes ever appended.

set(SortitionSumTreeFactory.SortitionSum.details: Set a value of a tree.

params._ID: The ID of the value. `O(log_k(n))` where `k` is the maximum number of childs per node in the tree,  and `n` is the maximum number of nodes ever appended.

stakeOf(SortitionSumTreeFactory.Sortitio.details: Gets a specified ID's associated value.
